title: Pirates of the Caribbean
overview: A swashbuckling tale of pirates, curses, and treasure.
cast: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley

title: Finding Nemo
overview: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: The Conjuring
overview: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
overview: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
overview: A quirky comedy about a legendary concierge and his adventures in a luxurious European hotel.
